name: Zenburn Theano Documentation
description: A dark style for the theano tutorials hosted on deeplearning.net
additional_info:
Code on the website will use the Inconsolata font if you have it installed

Math formulas and graphs are color inverted so that they look better on a dark background.

tested on
Chromium 41.0.2246.0 OS X 10.10
Firefox 35.0 Linux 3.18
